languages.text: "Много раз я слышал лязг клыков Моркаи над ухом..." {n}Ульфар ограждает себя от зла суеверным жестом.{/n} "... но не дал ему подобраться достаточно близко, чтобы вцепиться в мой зад".

"Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."
languages.original_text: "Много раз я слышал лязг клыков Моркаи над ухом..." {n}Ульфар ограждает себя от зла суеверным жестом.{/n} "... но не дал ему подобраться достаточно близко, чтобы вцепиться в мой зад".

traits.locale_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "... but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "... but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "... but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “有好多次，我都听到莫凯的獠牙在我耳边咔咔作响……”{n}乌尔法做了个迷信的手势，驱散邪灵。{/n}“……但我从来都没让它靠得太近，以免它一口把我屁股啃了。”
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: “有好多次，我都听到莫凯的獠牙在我耳边咔咔作响……”{n}乌尔法做了个迷信的手势，驱散邪灵。{/n}“……但我从来都没让它靠得太近，以免它一口把我屁股啃了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Muchas veces he oído el chasquido de los colmillos de Morkai junto a mis orejas...». {n}Ulfar hace un gesto supersticioso para protegerse del mal.{/n} «... pero nunca le he permitido acercarse tanto como para clavármelos en el trasero».
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: «Muchas veces he oído el chasquido de los colmillos de Morkai junto a mis orejas...». {n}Ulfar hace un gesto supersticioso para protegerse del mal.{/n} «... pero nunca le he permitido acercarse tanto como para clavármelos en el trasero».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は耳の横でモルカイの牙の音を何度も聞いた…」{n}ウルファーは迷信的な仕草で魔除けを結ぶ。{/n}「…だが、牙を尻に食い込ませるほど近づかせたことはない」
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は耳の横でモルカイの牙の音を何度も聞いた…」{n}ウルファーは迷信的な仕草で魔除けを結ぶ。{/n}「…だが、牙を尻に食い込ませるほど近づかせたことはない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Viele Male habe ich das Klackern von Morkais Zähnen neben meinem Ohr gehört"{n}, Ulfar führt eine abergläubische Geste aus, um das Böse abzuwehren, {/n}"doch nie habe ich ihn nah genug herangelassen, um sie in meinen Rumpf zu hauen."
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: "Viele Male habe ich das Klackern von Morkais Zähnen neben meinem Ohr gehört"{n}, Ulfar führt eine abergläubische Geste aus, um das Böse abzuwehren, {/n}"doch nie habe ich ihn nah genug herangelassen, um sie in meinen Rumpf zu hauen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai souvent entendu le claquement des crocs de Morkaï près de mon oreille... » {n}Ulfar repousse les forces maléfiques d'un geste superstitieux.{/n} « Mais je ne l'ai jamais laissé suffisamment approcher pour qu'il puisse les planter dans mon fondement. »
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai souvent entendu le claquement des crocs de Morkaï près de mon oreille... » {n}Ulfar repousse les forces maléfiques d'un geste superstitieux.{/n} « Mais je ne l'ai jamais laissé suffisamment approcher pour qu'il puisse les planter dans mon fondement. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "... but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

languages.text: "Çok kez Morkai'ın dişlerinin kulağımın dibinde takırdadığını duydum." {n}Ulfar, batıl bir hareketle kötülüğü defediyor.{/n} "Fakat hiçbir zaman beni ısırabilecek kadar yaklaşmasına izin vermedim."
languages.original_text: "Many times I have heard the clicking of Morkai's fangs next to my ear..." {n}Ulfar wards off evil with a superstitious gesture.{/n} "...but I have never allowed him close enough to sink them into my rump."

traits.locale_text: "Çok kez Morkai'ın dişlerini kulağımın dibinde takırdarken duydum." {n}Ulfar batıl bir hareketle kötülüğü defediyor.{/n} "Fakat hiçbir zaman beni ısırabilecek kadar yaklaşmasına izin vermedim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
